mapper.select: select count(*) from apply where status_flag=#{statusFlag}
select distinct(B.pos_name) from apply A join position B on A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO order by B.pos_name
select * from apply A inner join position B on A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO inner join resume R on A.RESUME_NO = R.RESUME_NO where apply_no = #{applyNo}
select AP.*, B.pos_name from apply AP inner join position B on AP.POS_NO = B.POS_NO order by apply_no desc
